sense.def: Pathological Condition identical with fen ci 粉刺 , flour thorns”. Ben cao gang mu 本草綱目 Substance Entry wang gua 王瓜 quoting ZHBJF 6: 土瓜根治面上 壘，䃺 褕 “ Tu gua roots cure facial seething-rash pebbles”, writes: 面上痱磊，土瓜根搗末，漿水和勻。入夜別以漿水洗面塗 藥，旦復洗之。百日光彩射人，夫妻不相識也。曾用有效 , “[To cure] facial seething-rash pebbles , grind tu gua root to a powder and mix with jiang shui . In the evening, in addition, use [pure] jiang shui to wash the face and externally apply the medication. Wash again in the early morning. After 100 days glossiness will hit that person. Husband and wife will not recognize each other. [I have] used it; it is effective”.
